items.name: White Flower
items.description: A white flower I found on the grass. It appears to be a lily... I think.

items.name: Wet White Flower
items.description: A white flower I took from a vase. It's probably a Lily.

items.name: Ritual Notes
items.description: I put everything I need to remember here.

items.name: Ritual Notes (Drawing)
items.description: This is how it looks in my head.

items.name: Candles
items.description: A bunch of candles. I need these for the ritual.

items.name: Chalk
items.description: A piece of chalk. I can draw various things with it.

items.name: Curtains
items.description: Red blackout curtains used to block as much light as possible.

items.name: Lighter
items.description: My personal lighter. I don't smoke, but I enjoy watching things burn.

items.name: Old Lighter
items.description: An old lighter I had lost a long time ago. It doesn't seem to work anymore.

items.name: Scissors
items.description: A regular pair of scissors. Not pointy enough to stab people with.

items.name: Girl's Hair
items.description: A tuft of hair I cut from the girl with brown hair.

items.name: Girl's Hair
items.description: A tuft of hair I cut from the girl with black hair.

items.name: Girl's Hair
items.description: A tuft of hair I cut from the girl with dark brown hair.

items.name: My Hair
items.description: A bit of hair I cut from myself. Looking at it makes me sad.

items.name: Protective Rune
items.description: A rune with some ancient symbol engraved.

items.name: Protective Rune
items.description: A rune with some ancient symbol engraved.

items.name: Protective Rune
items.description: A rune with some ancient symbol engraved.

items.name: Student's Notebook
items.description: A red notebook, probably forgotten by a student. The color and design are not my style.

items.name: Theater Club Key
items.description: The key to open the theater club room.

items.name: Dusty Hairpin
items.description: My trusty hairpin! I have a feeling this could come in handy.

items.name: Fairly Normal-Looking Key
items.description: A key I found on a long hallway.

items.name: Lettuce
items.description: You're not supposed to have this in your inventory.

items.name: Small Key
items.description: A small key, probably for a locker.

items.name: Strange Blueprints
items.description: Blueprints for an unknown device. You can't make heads or tails out of it.
